description: This file defines a ZoomTools class that provides methods to interact with Zoom's API for scheduling, listing, retrieving, and deleting meetings, as well as obtaining recordings and access tokens. It is part of a larger project involving Zoom integration.

classes.name: ZoomTools
classes.description: A class providing methods to manage Zoom meetings and recordings via Zoom's API, including authentication, scheduling, listing, retrieving, and deleting meetings.

methods.name: get_access_token
methods.description: Retrieves a valid OAuth access token for Zoom API, refreshing it if expired.

methods.name: schedule_meeting
methods.description: Schedules a new Zoom meeting with specified topic, start time, duration, and timezone.

methods.name: get_upcoming_meetings
methods.description: Fetches a list of upcoming meetings for a user.

methods.name: list_meetings
methods.description: Lists all meetings for a user, filtered by type.

methods.name: get_meeting_recordings
methods.description: Retrieves recordings for a specific meeting.

methods.name: get_meeting
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific meeting.

methods.name: instructions
methods.description: Provides usage instructions for the ZoomTools class.
